text:
Hi Nur!

Thanks for your feedback! I can definately try and take away some edge loops from Vessel, since that scene is getting very heavy. And yeah looking back, I could probably have made the mask lower poly. The detail on the "forehead" could most likely be done in Displacement like you say. I dont think I have enough time to go back and redo the topology for all these areas because I do want to get everything finished for my assessments which are coming up mid-May. 

Your notes about the arm anatomy - I actually used the same reference as you showed because I have the Anatomy For Sculptors book. I think if I showed the model directly from the front it does look like the reference, so I will try and send you a picture and see if you still think it needs some tweaks. 

As for Harbinger, I know his anatomy of the chest/shoulder is not entirely right. However the concept doesnt really feature that kind of human anatomy? I guess because he is bug-like and they dont have the same muscle structure. So I did wonder if I should stay from the concept and make the anatomy more accurate to a human, or if leaving it a bit closer to the concept but less "accurate" anatomically would be fine. Or maybe a sweet-spot somewhere in between?

Sorry for not replying sooner. I'm currently busy making my assessment video as I have a practice presentation on Thursday. If you like, I can send you the video once its finished, if you would like to hear about my process and my research and stuff. Might help let you know more about me :grin: but assessment isn't until the 18th of May so it would be a while yet before my video is completely done
